title: Blitz Skin: Donald Crank
body:
Could we please get a Blitz skin where
1. He's orange
2. He has a skinned Gnar on his head
3. He grabs people by the p***y

replies.body: Make A Hillary Caitlyn skin too, With Blonde hair and no Gun :3
I don't get the skinned Gnar part. Why would he have a skinless Gnar on his head please??? That sounds like animal abuse :/
